articles.title: How Ukraine lost its battle for a NATO membership commitment - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: As the summit wrapped, exhausted Ukrainian and NATO officials tried to put the spat behind them and highlighted Kyiv’s gains.
articles.content: VILNIUS Ukraine wanted this years NATO summit to end with a clear declaration that it will become an alliance member once the war ends, but President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is leaving Lithuania without … [+6555 chars]

articles.title: Over 60,000 People In Europe Died Of Heat Last Summer, Study Finds. Here’s Why This Year Could Be Even Hotter - Forbes

articles.title: Artemis 4 and Artemis 5 moon missions will include European astronauts - Space.com
articles.description: "I do everything to make sure that our commitment will be met," European Space Agency chief Josef Aschbacher tells Space.com.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. — We now know when Europeans will land on the moon alongside NASA astronauts.
